title: handwritten
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140124061102im_/http:/typophile.com/files/signature_TheMentor_4612.png)

Thank you so much for your help in identifying this font. So much appreciated.
author: jlt.scribe

comments.content: It looks like **[Enchanted Prairie Dog](http://web.archive.org/web/20140124061102/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Dafont-1&ffam=Enchanted%20Prairie%20Dog%20-%20Regular&fid=c12a1f9f7a53e6a009d6b2072cde45e5&fsize=60&text=The%20Mentor&fit=1)** free font by Serendipity Fonts (2004)
Thank you so much. You're awesome!
